column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////After being sick from what I believe was the Ramen on trip 3 I avoid Ramen like the plague for months
column2: especially Jinya. Then come down with a cold and mind goes back to Visit 1 Ramen and cold brain says
column3: give them one more shot. So I called in for a to-go order
column4: or tried to. Tell the person on the phone I need an order to go
column5: get put on hold very briskly. Second person picks up
column6: I proceed to start placing my order. Second person states in a frustrated tone that she can not hear me. I let her know I was speaking loudly
column7: even though I am in an office setting and she states
column9: that it is really loud there and she can't hear...so my own frustrated cold brain said forget it
column10: not worth it and hung up.
